verses.name: Psalms 76:1
verses.text: In Judah is God known: his name is great in Israel.

verses.name: Psalms 76:2
verses.text: In Salem also is his tabernacle, and his dwelling place in Zion.

verses.name: Psalms 76:3
verses.text: There brake he the arrows of the bow, the shield, and the sword, and the battle. Selah.

verses.name: Psalms 76:4
verses.text: Thou art more glorious and excellent than the mountains of prey.

verses.name: Psalms 76:5
verses.text: The stouthearted are spoiled, they have slept their sleep: and none of the men of might have found their hands.

verses.name: Psalms 76:6
verses.text: At thy rebuke, O God of Jacob, both the chariot and horse are cast into a dead sleep.
